vote.title: To authorize the Finance and Management Director to modify and renew a Universal Term Contract for the option to purchase data services with AT & T, and to declare an emergency.
vote.description:
Explanation
 
BACKGROUND:  This legislation authorizes the Finance and Management Director to modify and renew an existing Universal Term Contract (UTC) for the option to obtain Data Services with AT & T.  This contract provides for data service, equipment delivering the services, maintenance and repairs.  Department of Technology uses this contract to provide internet services citywide.  
 
The contract, PO007219 was established in accordance with the relevant provisions of Columbus City Code Chapter 329 relating to Sole Source provisions.  The Purchasing Office did not advertise or solicit competitive bids.  The contract was authorized under Ordinance Number 0328-2020, passed February 27, 2020 and will expire March 31, 2021.  The City and AT & T agreed to modify the contract for three (3) additional one year terms subject to an annual mutual agreement and approval of proper City Authorities.  The contract modification expiration date will be March 31, 2024.  
 
EMERGENCY DESIGNATION:  The Finance and Management Department respectfully requests this legislation  be considered an emergency measure to insure there is no interruption of services provided.
 
FISCAL IMPACT: No funding is required to renew the option contract.  The Department of Technology, and other City agencies utilizing the contract must set aside their own funding for their estimated expenditures. 
 
 
Title
 
To authorize the Finance and Management Director to modify and renew a Universal Term Contract for the option to purchase data services with AT & T, and to declare an emergency.
 
 
Body
 
WHEREAS, the Purchasing Office entered into a Universal Term Contract for Data Services for use by Department of Technology providing services citywide; and  
 
WHEREAS, this contract was entered into in accordance with Chapter 329 of the Columbus City Code with  deemed the lowest, most responsive, and best bidder pursuant to the Sole Source provisions, and
 
WHEREAS, in accordance with the modification, the City and AT & T can renew the contract for three (3) additional one year periods, subject to mutual agreement and approval of proper City authorities annually; and,
 
WHEREAS, an emergency exists in the usual daily operation of the Department of Technology in that it is necessary to authorize the Finance and Management Director to immediately renew a Universal Term Contract with AT & T for the option to obtain Data Services, thereby preserving the public health, peace, property, safety, and welfare; now, therefore: 
 
BE IT ORDAINED BY THE COUNCIL OF THE CITY OF COLUMBUS:
 
SECTION 1.  That the Finance and Management Director is hereby authorized to modify and renew the option contract with AT & T, PO007219 for three (3) one year periods, from March 31, 2021 to and including March 31, 2024.
 
SECTION 2.  That for the reasons stated in the preamble hereto, which is hereby made a part hereof, this ordinance is hereby declared to be an emergency measure and shall take effect and be in force from and after its passage and approval by the Mayor, or ten days after passage if the Mayor neither approves nor vetoes the same.
